title: Maduro wins reelection amid outcry over vote
text:
Maduro wins re-election amid outcry over vote 10:40am BST - 02:03
Venezuela’s President Nicolas Maduro comfortably won re-election in a controversial vote on Sunday, the election board said, though his main rivals both declared the poll illegitimate due to alleged widespread irregularities. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Venezuela’s President Nicolas Maduro comfortably won re-election in a controversial vote on Sunday, the election board said, though his main rivals both declared the poll illegitimate due to alleged widespread irregularities.
